item.title: Sample for xml-js
item.description: Using xml-js for Apps Script Snippet Run it Init it before using Snippet See full code Leave a comment Create script from the snippet  *See how to use scrviz for clone Apps Script project Run it run.js /** * */ function runXML2JSON() { var xml = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>' + '<note importance="high" logged="true">' + ' <title>Happy</title>' + ' <todo>Work</todo>' + ' <todo>Play</todo>' + '</note>'; var result1 = convert.xml2json(xml, { compact: true, spaces: 4 }); var result2 = convert.
